Posts.Content: I have painful breasts with several little lumps. I've been diagnosed with fibrocystic breasts which is a benign and very common condition. Hormone related. Smooth movable lumps are usually cysts or fibronomas. Best get checked out if you've found something new though.
Posts.Title: Painful breasts! Left one worse! Pls help!!

Posts.Content: Mine is about twice the size. I only have to have a mammogram every 3 years unless it grows or I'm concerned about anything else.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: I don't know where you live but here in the UK we only get mammograms routinely every 3 years. Yes I take birth control pills but fortunately they haven't caused it to grow anymore. I've also got 4 breast cysts which have stayed the same small size for several years now.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: No it wasn't painful at all. Just a bit of pressure and done in a couple of minutes. Quicker than the core biopsy.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: That's really good news. I had exactly the same outcome. It's such a weight lifted.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: No that's all I was told too. Completely harmless. I've had mine for several years now and it hasn't got any bigger or caused me any problems.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: I didn't know there were different sorts of cysts. They showed up as little lumps on the mammogram. When I had the ultrasound it's obvious they are cysts as they're hollow. The lump that wasn't hollow they did the core biopsy on and that was the fibronoma. I then had a really big cyst that literally came up overnight. That was drained and hasn't reoccurred. The doctor says I have fibrocystic breasts. The main concern with this is that with all these various lumps, a new more sinister lump might go unnoticed.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2
